Key Match Events: Stephen Curry exited the game against the Los Angeles Clippers after turning his ankle twice.
Curry had 18 points, four rebounds, and six assists in 26 minutes before leaving the game.
Curry re-entered the game in the fourth quarter but exited again after re-aggravating his ankle injury.
Post-Match Reflections: Warriors head coach Steve Kerr described Curry's sprain as 'mild' or 'moderate' and mentioned that Curry would get an MRI on Sunday night.
